import React from 'react' import {Row, Col, Image, Badge, Table} from 'react-bootstrap' class Print extends React.Component{ constructor(props){ super(props) this.state = { data: null } } getTotals = (data) => { let total = 0; data.forEach(item => { total += item.total; }); return total; }; render(){ return(
{this.props.data &&
{this.props.data.attributes.status}
{this.state.data}

{ this.props.data.attributes.company.attributes.legal_name }

Telepon : {this.props.data.attributes.company.attributes.phone }
Email : { this.props.data.attributes.company.attributes.email }
Alamat : { this.props.data.attributes.company.attributes.city || '-' }

{this.props.type} #{this.props.data.attributes.id}

Nama Vendor:
{this.props.data.attributes.customer.full_name}
Telp. Vendor:
{this.props.data.attributes.customer.phone}
Tanggal Purchase:
{this.props.data.attributes.date}
Nama Petugas:
{this.props.data.attributes.user.attributes.full_name}
Purchase number:
{this.props.data.attributes.id}
Jumlah Pesanan:
{this.props.data.attributes.item.length}
{ this.props.data.attributes.item.map((data, index) => ( )) }
Nama Item Jumlah Harga Diskon PPN Total Harga
{data.item_name} {Number(data.quantity)} {this.props.type === 'Puchase Order' ? Number(data.buying_price) : Number(data.selling_price)} {Number(data.discount)}% {Number(data.tax)}% {data.total == 'NaN' ? 0 : Number(data.total) }
TOTAL {Number(this.getTotals(this.props.data.attributes.item))}

Penerima,                







(.................................................)
}
) } } export default Print;
